alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 8:43PM EDT until July 12 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Buren County in southwestern Michigan... Allegan County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 842 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Saugatuck to 14 miles northwest of Stevensville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Allegan... South Haven... Paw Paw... Wayland... Otsego... Plainwell... Hartford... Mattawan... Lawton... Bangor... Decatur... Fennville... Saugatuck... Martin... Van Buren SP... Lake Michigan Beach... Pine Grove... Covert... Ganges... Keeler... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
